name: streams_investor_relations
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool stocktwits.
Tool description: StockTwits provides a social communications platform and social graph for anyone interested in the markets and investing.
API description: Fetches the most recent messages posted by verified Investor Relations customers from the StockTwits API.

since.description: Returns results with an ID greater than (more recent than) the specified ID.

max.description: Returns results with an ID less than (older than) or equal to the specified ID.

limit.description: The number of results to return, default and max limit is 30. This limit must be a number under 30. Defaults to '20'.

callback.description: Defines your own callback function name for JSONP support, add this parameter as the value. Defaults to None.
